item.description:
Come and Celebrate the Fruits of Our Ocean!

¡Celebrar los frutos de nuestro mar!
Selebre Fwi ki nan lanmè nou an
Celebrar os frutos do nosso mar
Kỷ niệm Quả biển của chúng tôi

Discover the variety of fresh local seafood available at the farmers markets, see local chefs in action as they cook their favorite seafood recipes, sample delicious dishes prepared right before your eyes. The Dorchester Winter Farmers’ Market will feature Chef Ananda Pokhrel of Shanti Taste of India and other local chefs who will prepare local seafood dishes based on the local catch of the day and fresh ingredients from vendors of the market. Tastings will be available, but must register at market for tasting. Filet demos by Red's Best and children's activities will also take place at the market.

This event is presented by Boston Collaborative for Food and Fitness in partnership with Northeast Marine Atlantic Alliance (NAMA) and Health Care Without Harm. Project supported by Boston Children's Hospital.

Let us know if you plan to attend. Join us on Facebook!

https://www.facebook.com/events/264942180303850/
item.name: Rescheduled- Celebrate the Fruits of Our Ocean- Dorchester Farmers' Market- FREE
